root.name: Real Football 2009
root.description: Real Football 2009 is a soccer game for the Nintendo DS, Apple iPhone as well as standard mobile phones. It is the sequel to Real Football 2008. The DS and iPhone versions boast full 3D graphics, while the mobile version uses a 2D isometric view. It is developed by gameloft. There is also DSi version is due for release through the DSi's download service DSiWare between April and July in Europe and Australia. Game modes Real Football 2009 features many game modes: Exhibition Cup League Penalty kicks Training Multiplayer Teams Real Football 2009 features unlicensed versions of teams, both international and club. The full leagues included are: English Premier League French Ligue 1 German Bundesliga Italian Serie A Spanish La LigaThere is also a selection of teams from other leagues. DSi VersionIn the DSi version of the game you can take a picture and skin that on either the ball, one of the players, the stadions billboards or the team's flag. The Dsiware version of the game was released during the week of May 11th, 2009
